name: geoposler
description: Geoposler is a self-hosted GPS tracking and location monitoring system that integrates with devices to track live positions on maps. Useful for fleet tracking or personal location sharing in private setups.
features: Live GPS Tracking: Monitor real-time GPS positions from connected devices on interactive maps.
Map Visualization: Display tracked locations on OpenStreetMap or other map providers with customizable markers.
Private Sharing: Share location data with selected users without relying on third-party services.
Fleet Management: Track multiple vehicles or devices simultaneously for fleet coordination.
Location History: Store and review historical location data with timeline playback.
Device Integration: Connect GPS trackers, smartphones, and IoT devices for position reporting.
Geofencing: Define geographic boundaries and receive alerts when devices enter or exit zones.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Maintain complete control over location data without cloud service dependencies.
